subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The young, gifted Tar Heels are capable of exploding at any moment, and that was what they did Friday night as they roared back from a 16-point second-half deficit.
snippet: The young, gifted Tar Heels are capable of exploding at any moment, and that was what they did Friday night as they roared back from a 16-point second-half deficit.
